data.name: Bigger Than Me Demo
data.detailed_description:
Max is a 20-something year old trying to make a living on his own in the big city. He shares appartment with Mica who finished his degree a while ago and can't find a job, time passes and the day to pay the rent is getting closer. Until now, this was his biggest problem, now let's say... he has a much bigger one: he turns into a giant every time he hears the word future.

What will you find?:

    [When Max becomes giant you will have to solve contextual puzzles in order to help him get out of the situation.]

    [Minigames, each of them different!.]

    [Point & click mechanics in this strange graphic adventure… What is happening to Max?]

    [A game full of humor and references.]

    [Colorful and detailed cartoon-style scenarios.]

    [Charismatic animated characters full of life.]
